series_description: This series documents Permit-By-Rule approvals for eligible small renewable energy projects. This series may include, but not limited to: application submittals, notice of intent, impact on NAAQS, site plan, operating plan, engineer certification regarding rated capacity and design, wildlife and historic resources analyses, public meeting notice and public comments, local government certification of compliance with land use ordinances, interconnection studies, final agreement, certification that all necessary environmental permits have obtained or applied for, and wildlife and historic-resources mitigation plans.
retention_statement: 5 Years after equipment, facility, or property sold or no longer in use

series_description: This series documents agency guidance and procedure documentation for Small Renewable Energy Project Rules (PBR). This series may include, but is not limited to: solar, and combustion PBR guidance, procedures, and templates.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_title: Small Renewable Energy Projects: Permit-By-Rule (PBR) Regulation
series_description: This series documents final Permit-By-Rule (PBR) regulations for wind, solar, and combustion small renewable energy projects
